text: Gale Arnot Brewer (born September 6, 1951) is an American politician. She was the Borough President of the New York City borough of Manhattan and a Democratic politician. She was a member of the New York City Council. She was elected Manhattan Borough President on November 5, 2013. ==References== Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:Manhattan borough presidents Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Gale Brewer
